tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE VotingRecords (
    voter_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    candidate_id UUID,
    election_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    vote_option VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE votes (
    vote_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT,
    candidate_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES voters (voter_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (candidate_id) REFERENCES candidates (candidate_id)
);
